li.text:
Valkyries - This is the main race, they are very strong in close combat and will always be the best fighters in your settlement. This race has a dependence on biological age, some parameters grow with it, so the older the Valkyrie, the stronger it is.<color=#a2adff>

- Have an increased chance of being bonded to a pet in a settlement.
- Slightly reduced global work speed.
- Valkyries are good at treating wounds.
- The chance of a successful surgery operation is 20% lower.
- Significant melee bonus</color>

li.label: Enable wanderer event
li.tooltip: Unlocks the event. The event chance is configured in the "General" tab.
